project.name: J-C190B-LUCE-05-ST02-DT02-DF06-CF16-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C190B-LUCE-05-ST02-DT02-DF06-CF16-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_uhBVfsPb5rn2gVDEAguU AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Eax3SvDUUW OR (NOT finished_bpsz0RZJ3A AND NOT (controlled_exit_kfNKyysAGI OR continued_execution_dD4Lb3nbor)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Eax3SvDUUW OR (NOT finished_bpsz0RZJ3A AND NOT (controlled_exit_kfNKyysAGI OR continued_execution_dD4Lb3nbor))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Eax3SvDUUW OR (NOT finished_bpsz0RZJ3A AND NOT (controlled_exit_kfNKyysAGI OR continued_execution_dD4Lb3nbor)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Eax3SvDUUW OR (NOT finished_bpsz0RZJ3A AND NOT (controlled_exit_kfNKyysAGI OR continued_execution_dD4Lb3nbor)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_CyQ91dW576tQcAU2Knyg AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Ykxo2HfuIU OR (NOT finished_TMreX8Oy9q AND NOT (controlled_exit_JPcCNLoJio OR continued_execution_ETn8nYATR4)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Ykxo2HfuIU OR (NOT finished_TMreX8Oy9q AND NOT (controlled_exit_JPcCNLoJio OR continued_execution_ETn8nYATR4))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Ykxo2HfuIU OR (NOT finished_TMreX8Oy9q AND NOT (controlled_exit_JPcCNLoJio OR continued_execution_ETn8nYATR4)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Ykxo2HfuIU OR (NOT finished_TMreX8Oy9q AND NOT (controlled_exit_JPcCNLoJio OR continued_execution_ETn8nYATR4)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
